Translations.Text: Ku akhri Magaca Rabbigaa, ee abuuray
Akhri! Oo Rabbigaa waa Sharaf Badnaha
Ee baray sida wax loogu qoro qalinka
Inuu isu arko mid deeqtoon darteed
Ma waad aragtay midka isaga ka reeba
Bal ka warran haddii uu ku sugan yahay jid toosan
Amaba uu amro xume ka dhowrsiga
Bal ka warran haddii uu kaasina beeniyo Xaqa, oo dhabarka u jeediyo
Mayee! Haddii uusan meel joogin, waxaanu hubaal qaban doonnaa foodda
Food beenley ah oo gefley ah
Waxaan innaguna u yeereynaa malaaâ€™ig daran
Mayee, Ha adeecin isaga, oo sujuud, oo u dhowow (Allaah)
